rule: The chatbot must respond with only one part of speech tag from the predefined list: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
complianceText:
The chatbot output includes multiple entries ("POS: DT" and "CC: SC") instead of returning only a single part of speech tag as specified. Additionally, "SC" is not a recognized tag in the provided list of part-of-speech tags.

ERR
